abstract: "Charisma isn't everything," warns the dean of admissions at Harvard. "We're trying to find people who make others around them better."
snippet: "Charisma isn't everything," warns the dean of admissions at Harvard. "We're trying to find people who make others around them better."
lead_paragraph: The entire concept of an "ideal" college candidate unsettles me. I thought we were in the business of creating individuals, not "ideals."

headline.main: Colleges Discuss the 'Ideal' High School Graduate
